item.text: So you, my child, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> say<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">in the presence of</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3908">entrust</st> to <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">competent</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well</st>.

<st data-num="4777" class="">Take</st> your <st data-num="4777">share of suffering</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4757" class="">soldier</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="3762" class="">No one</st> in <st data-num="4754" class="">military service</st> <st data-num="1707" class="">gets entangled</st> in <st data-num="4230" class="">matters</st> of everyday <st data-num="979" class="">life;</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">otherwise</st> he will not <st data-num="700" class="">please</st><n id="1" /> the one who <st data-num="4758" class="">recruited</st> him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Also</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="118" class="">competes as an athlete</st>, he will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4737" class="">crowned as the winner</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> he <st data-num="118" class="">competes</st> <st data-num="3545">according to the rules</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="1092" class="">farmer</st> who <st data-num="2872">works hard</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">ought</st> to have the <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="3335" class="">share</st> of the <st data-num="2590" class="">crops</st>.
Think about what I am saying and the Lord will give you understanding of all this.
Remember Jesus Christ, raised from the dead, a descendant of David; such is my gospel,

<st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> I <st data-num="2553">suffer hardship</st> to the <st data-num="3360" class="">point</st> of <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="2557" class="">criminal</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">imprisoned</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1223 3778">So</st> I <st data-num="5278" class="">endure</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="1223">for the sake of</st> those <st data-num="1588" class="">chosen</st> by God,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, may <st data-num="5177" class="">obtain</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3326">and its</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.<n id="2" />

This saying is trustworthy:

If we died with him, we will also live with him.

If we endure, we will also reign with him.

If we deny him, he will also deny us.
If we are unfaithful, he remains faithful, since he cannot deny himself.
Remind people of these things and solemnly charge them before the Lord not to wrangle over words. This is of no benefit; it just brings ruin on those who listen.

<st data-num="4704">Make every effort</st> to <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> before <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> as a <st data-num="1384" class="">proven</st> <st data-num="2040" class="">worker</st> who does not need to be <st data-num="422" class="">ashamed</st>, <st data-num="3718" class="">teaching</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="3718" class="">accurately</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4026" class="">avoid</st> <st data-num="952" class="">profane</st> <st data-num="2757" class="">chatter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> those occupied with it will <st data-num="4298" class="">stray</st> <st data-num="4183">further and further</st> into <st data-num="763" class="">ungodliness</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> will <st data-num="2192">spread</st> its <st data-num="3542" class="">infection</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1044" class="">gangrene</st>. <st data-num="5211" class="">Hymenaeus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5372" class="">Philetus</st> <st data-num="1510">are</st> in this <st data-num="3739" class="">group</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3748">They</st> have <st data-num="795" class="">strayed</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> that the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">has</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">occurred</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they are <st data-num="396" class="">undermining</st> <st data-num="5100">some people’s</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.
However, God’s solid foundation remains standing, bearing this seal: “The Lord knows those who are his,” and “Everyone who confesses the name of the Lord must turn away from evil.”
Now in a wealthy home there are not only gold and silver vessels, but also ones made of wood and of clay, and some are for honorable use, but others for ignoble use.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1571" class="">cleanses</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3778">such behavior</st>,<n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="4632" class="">vessel</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honorable use</st>, <st data-num="37">set apart</st>, <st data-num="2173" class="">useful</st> for the <st data-num="1203" class="">Master</st>, <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5343">keep away from</st> <st data-num="3512" class="">youthful</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">passions</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">pursue</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>, <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st>, <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, and <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>, <st data-num="3326">in company with</st> others<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="1941">call on</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3868" class="">reject</st> <st data-num="3474" class="">foolish</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="521" class="">ignorant</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2214" class="">controversies</st> because you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> they <st data-num="1080" class="">breed</st> <st data-num="3163" class="">infighting</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3164">engage in heated disputes</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2261" class="">kind</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, an <st data-num="1317">apt teacher</st>, <st data-num="420" class="">patient</st>,

<st data-num="3811" class="">correcting</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="475" class="">opponents</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4240" class="">gentleness</st>. <st data-num="3379" class="">Perhaps</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st> <st data-num="1519">and then</st> <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" />
and they will come to their senses and escape the devil’s trap where they are held captive to do his will.
